entry.tran: （固定在门上供敲门用的）门环
entry.def: A knocker is a piece of metal on the front door of a building, which you use to hit the door in order to attract the attention of the people inside.

means.word_mean: 1. (Yiddish) a big shot who knows it and acts that way; a boastful immoderate person

5. a device (usually metal and ornamental) attached by a hinge to a door
